column7: Altium 365 Solutions has been pivotal in helping RESOLVE build and implement TrailGuard AI, which is used as a security system for national parks to detect, stop, and arrest poachers. Altium 365 Solutions allowed the TrailGuard AI team to connect, innovate and exchange project ideas with their globally-based engineers in real-time. Altium 365 Solutions software provides flexibility and freedom to designers and engineers and has assisted with RESOLVE producing a conservation tool that, if applied appropriately, can help to facilitate the protection and monitoring of wildlife and other conservation challenges.

column6: IUCN Red List species and national conversation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations

column13: We have advanced a methodology and system to calculate GHG emissions for materials when designing a PCB in Altium 365. We call this concept Sustainability by Design. It seeks to innovate where no existing system automatically calculates emissions during the design phase. It has reached proof of concept and represents an exciting development to test further in FY24.

In FY23, Altium Germany introduced a new benefit to our employees who are not entitled to another commuting allowance. Those employees can apply for a company-paid commuter benefit called Ã¢ÂÂJobticketÃ¢ÂÂ. Following the rollout of the new benefit, 54% of eligible employees have applied.

column7: A key part of our ESG approach is to promote sustainability in electronics. Altium has been progressing with PCB design and manufacture initiatives that address the design, production and disposal of PCBs and associated materials. While not yet realised, our objective is to reduce the environmental impact of PCBs across the entire product lifecycle. Still, in the development and testing phase of these initiatives, our strategic intention is to Better connect product design and manufacturing processes in the cloud, Provide a line of sight across the entire electronics manufacturing value chain, and Support customers in developing lower-impact electronics.

column13: We also created a suite of recruitment enablement materials with our Talent Acquisition team to provide our candidates with further insight into the Altium story, our vision and mission and the lived experience of working with us and contributing to our transformative agenda for the electronics industry. Our onboarding process was then enhanced to facilitate enablement and time to realise potential.

column6: Occupation health and safety management system
column7: Altium offices have designated OH&S champions, office health and safety reps, and first aiders. They are periodically inspected by third parties to attest to safety and ensure that relevant standards are being met. Staff are provided with adjustable equipment so workstations can be ergonomically set up to meet individual needs.

column7: As part of onboarding processes, jurisdiction-suitable OH&S training is assigned to new starters. Employees continue to undertake annual training to ensure OH&S and wellbeing are at the forefront of all our interactions.
